languages.text: {n}Сотня мальпийцев была пострижена в Орден Молота, и два учения были вынуждены сосуществовать в стенах одного монастыря.{/n}
{n}One hundred Malpians were tonsured into the Order of the Hammer, and the two teachings were forced to coexist within the walls of one monastery.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сотня мальпийцев была пострижена в Орден Молота, и два учения были вынуждены сосуществовать в стенах одного монастыря.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一百名马尔皮人被册封为重锤修会的成员，两种教义被迫在同一间修道院的高墙内共存。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians were tonsured into the Order of the Hammer, and the two teachings were forced to coexist within the walls of one monastery.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cien malpianos fueron incluidos en la Orden del Martillo, y las dos enseñanzas se vieron obligadas a coexistir dentro de los muros de un monasterio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}100人のマルピ人が鉄槌の修道会に入団したため、2つの教義が1つの修道院の壁の中で共存することを余儀なくされた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians were tonsured into the Order of the Hammer, and the two teachings were forced to coexist within the walls of one monastery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}100人のマルピ人が鉄槌の修道会に入団したため、2つの教義が1つの修道院の壁の中で共存することを余儀なくされた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cent Malpiens sont intronisés dans l'Ordre du Marteau, et les deux croyances sont obligées à coexister dans un même monastère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians were tonsured into the Order of the Hammer, and the two teachings were forced to coexist within the walls of one monastery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cent Malpiens sont intronisés dans l'Ordre du Marteau, et les deux croyances sont obligées à coexister dans un même monastère.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einhundert Malpianer wurden durch eine Tonsur in den Orden des Hammers aufgenommen, und die beiden Lehren wurden gezwungen, in den Mauern eines einzigen Klosters zu koexistieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüz adet Malpili, saçlarını kazıyarak Çekiç Tarikatı'na katıldı. Her iki öğreti, tek bir manastırın duvarları arasında bir arada var olmak zorunda bırakıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians were tonsured into the Order of the Hammer, and the two teachings were forced to coexist within the walls of one monastery.{/n}
